name: basic-interop-view
title: Basic Interop View
description: This is an example of a basic OpenFin Interop View. This view calls setContext on the Interop api and passes a context object with a ticker as it's ID and a type of 'instrument'. This view also adds a context handler using the Interop api and can receive objects sent via the fin.me.interop.setContext or fdc3.broadcast api. It listens for objects of type 'instrument' or 'fdc3.instrument'.

name: basic-fdc3-view
title: Basic FDC3 View
description: This is an example of a basic OpenFin FDC3 View. This view calls broadcast on the FDC3 api and passes a context object with a ticker as it's ID and a type of 'fdc3.instrument'. This view also adds a context listener using the FDC3 api and can receive objects sent via the fdc3.broadcast or fin.me.interop.setContext api calls. It listens for objects of type 'fdc3.instrument' or 'instrument'.
